instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3115 SM_RESET_L pulsing on/off
threads.message: Hi, I have an 3115 that had no green light, I replaced Q5490 as it was black and the board came back to life got a green light again and 12.6v on PPBUS.. After I ultrasonic-ed it the green light was going on/off all the time like 3 seconds off, 1 second on. SMC_RESET_L is pulsing between 0 and 3.43v. PPBUS is moving between 3.3v and 9v and then reset. If I wait few minutes the fan starts to spin (high) but no chime yet.
